abstract: Arkansas Gov Asa Hutchinson petitions lawmakers to keep open state's 'private option,' alternative to Medicaid expansion under Affordable Care Act, for two years while new recommendations are prepared.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Asa Hutchinson asked lawmakers to keep the state’s alternative to Medicaid expansion under the Affordable Care Act in place for two more years.
snippet: Gov. Asa Hutchinson asked lawmakers to keep the state’s alternative to Medicaid expansion under the Affordable Care Act in place for two more years.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Arkansas: Governor Seeks to Continue an Alternative to Medicaid
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Governor Seeks to Continue an Alternative to Medicaid
